sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './Cart.css' function CartPage() { const {cartItems} = useSelector(state=>state.cart) return (

Your Cart

{ cartItems.length > 0 ? (
{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.title}
Quantity: {item.quantity}
Price: {(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}$
))}
Part of your order qualifies for free shipping. Select this option when paying details
Total: {cartItems .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur.price * cur.quantity, 0) .toFixed(2)} $
) : (

Your cart is empty

) }
) } export default CartPage
